category: Membership/Withdrawal Regulations/Article 10 (Member City/Provincial Sports Association Membership and Grade)
contents: Article 10 (Member City/Provincial Sports Association Membership and Grade) ① Pursuant to Article 33-2 of the National Sports Promotion Act, member city/provincial sports associations that wish to join the Sports Council as members must submit all of the following documents. 1. Membership application form (Form No. 2 attached) 2. Organization introduction (region introduction, organizational status, etc.) 3. List of executives (including individual inauguration acceptance letters and resumes) 4. Articles of incorporation and all regulations of the organization 5. Comprehensive local government Corporate license 6. Certified copy of corporate register 7. Business plan and budget for the current year 8. Minutes of general meeting of corporation establishment ② Member city/provincial sports associations are deemed to have joined as regular members. ③ Member city/provincial sports associations are excluded from grade deliberation.
